game.name: Space Ripper Plastiline
game.description:
It is time to enter the biggest war of the universe! Are you ready friends? Join Space Ripper Plastiline and prove the world that you are best when it comes to handling battles whether they occur on the ground or in the space! When you click the play button, you would be entered a plasticine universe where plenty of battles on the space ships are taking place. Take your seat on a spaceship and get ready to fly through all the hurdles and obstacles towards your destination in this brand new adventure game!
Be prepared to become a hardcore space shooter while protecting your spaceship against many dangerous enemies! Surviving even for 5 minutes will be tough for you. So, get ready to put your intense fighting abilities and target hitting skills to complete each level with the maximum possible score. Try to maneuver your spaceship in the space like never before and destroy as many enemies as possible by directing the sight of your guns at them! 
Make sure to aim your rocket accurately at your target and allow you to blow up the enemy ship in a few seconds. Use WASD to control your character and LMB to shoot your target in this html5 war game! Aim your target using the mouse and shield through RMB and deathray through the space key! Hope you would have more fun in our more popular titles from the category of space adventure games for boys and girls that are free to play online, no download required!

game.metaDesc: Play the online free game Space Ripper Plastiline at atmegame.com ! We have selected this Shooting games for best excitement and thrill in you!
